item.description:
**NOTE: Our November Meetup is moved to the SECOND Tuesday in November.**

******************************************
Many of us had the wonderful opportunity to join in the interactive high-content training TELE-Meetup with Michael Losier on Tues, 9/29. Michael is an expert Law of Attraction trainer, best-seller author and radio host.

Here's a recording of his TELE-training with us on 9/29. We strongly recommend that you listen to this recording before you meetup with us on Tuesday.
http://www.audioacrob...

Michael informed us that the most immediate follow-up action to take after attending his training session is to take the time to sit down and work through his 3 Steps Process for Deliberate Attraction. How many of us intend to do this, yet we get caught up in the busy-ness of our lives, and we never get going on?

At our October Meetup, we worked through Step 1 and part of Step 2 of Michael Losier's three-step process for deliberate attraction.

At our November meetup, we'll continue to
- listen (via CDs* we have) of steps 2 and 3 of Michael's three-step process for deliberate attraction

- work through worksheets and exercises, with support from each other

Even if you've missed our October Meetup, you want to be at our November meetup. We will be focusing on Step 3 which is all about ALLOWING - having belief that you will manifest more of what you want. It's no surprise that this is the most challenging for most people. You'll learn about
- formulating powerful ALLOWING Statement(s) and
- 12 Allowing Tools
that will provide you with relief which helps remove doubt.

David Buck and Chew-Hoong Koh, the co-organizers of the BostonLOA Meetup, will be the facilitators.

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this and we very much appreciate your understanding and support!


***************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here:http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Put Into Action Michael Losier's Step 2 & 3: ALLOWING ( less doubt, More Belief)
